text: From the firstborn of the Israelites he took the money, one thousand three hundred and sixty-five shekels according to the sanctuary shekel.
And they cried aloud to Heaven: â€œWhat shall we do with these, and where shall we take them?
Until the LORD from heaven looks down and sees.
and made the inside of the furnace as though a dew-laden breeze were blowing through it. The fire in no way touched them or caused them pain or harm.
